content:
Title: Recent Advances in Advanced Technologies for Interrogating and Detecting Neural Activities: A Systematic Review

Research Question: What are the recent developments in advanced materials, devices, algorithms and systems for brain-machine interfaces that enable the interrogation and detection of neural activities with high spatiotemporal resolution?

Objective: The objective of this systematic review is to provide a comprehensive analysis of recent advances in advanced technologies for interrogating and detecting neural activities. The review will explore the current state of the art in the development of materials, devices
